source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a snowy landscape featuring three white yurts and several leafless trees scattered around. The camera slowly pans to the right, revealing more of the snowy terrain and additional trees. As the camera continues to move, a red house with a snow-covered roof comes into view on the right side of the frame. The camera further pans right, showing more of the red house and a wooden structure in the foreground.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video begins with a view of a snowy landscape featuring three white yurts and several leafless trees scattered around. The camera slowly pans to the right, revealing more of the snowy terrain and additional trees. As the camera continues to move, a red house with a snow-covered roof comes into view on the right side of the frame. The camera further pans right, showing more of the red house and a wooden structure in the foreground.

bad_caption: The video opens with a view of a sandy beach where several colorful umbrellas are set up along the shoreline. The camera slowly pans to the left, revealing groups of people playing volleyball and children building sandcastles near the water. As the camera continues to move, a large sailboat passes by in the background, and a lifeguard tower becomes visible on the left side of the frame. The camera further pans left, showing more of the lifeguard tower and a row of palm trees lining the edge of the beach.
